EmailTemplate.description: "Karate Academy", hosted at The British School of Guangzhou, starts this weekend.
EmailTemplate.name: "Karate Academy", hosted at The British School of Guangzhou, starts this weekend
EmailTemplate.subject: "Karate Academy", hosted at The British School of Guangzhou, starts this weekend.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Thursday 24th April 2014
Dear Parents,
Our friends from the Guangzhou Tiger Temple Academy (GTTA) will be running weekend Karate classes at the school for the remainder of this term.
- Dates: 26th April to 22nd June
- Times: Saturdays, 12 to 4pm and Sundays, 9am to 4pm
For details of the programme, age group divisions and registration details please CLICK HERE or contact Sensei Enrique Novoa through <karateguangzhou@gmail.com>
Best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
____________________________________________________________
A Nord Anglia Education School - University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International Schools In Asia (FOBISIA)- Member of the Council of British International Schools (COBIS) - Member of the Council of International
